page.title: 09ELY FIRE STATION
page.content: Firemen wear yellow trousers,black coats and wellington boots.At Ely fire station there are two fire engines.They cost Â£120,000 each.They are going to get a new fire engine soon. When there is a fire an alarm goes off in the fire station and the firemen have to go off quickly in the engines with their sirens going,to the fire They have a lot of equipment in fire engines to put out fires and to free people trapped in cars or lifts, or even with their heads stuck in railings. When the firemen start their morning shift at 9 am. First of all they check all equipment in the fire engines. After this they practice at the fire station using the tower and their breathing apparatus.Sometimes they have lectures. cont.
